title: Why we do not have fur on our body naturally? Why are most of all humans clothed? Why we can not live naked as tribes people? - Quora

response.answer_text: Clothes are more versatile.  You can take them off if it is hot, put on more if it is cold, replace them if they get infested with bugs or wet, etc. Fur is an amazing thing, and it provides a lot of advantages for lots of animals.  But those animals aren't cognitively and/or physically capable of clothing themselves with the fur of other animals.
